question: List types of mutations.
ideal_answer:
point mutations
deletions
insertions
inversions
translocations

snippets.text: NGS is utilized to novel diagnostic and rare cancer mutations, detection of translocations, inversions, insertions and deletions,
Deletions are the most common types of mutations in α-thal, followed by point mutations and small insertion/deletion.
qEva-CRISPR detects all types of mutations, including point mutations and large deletions,

exact_answer: point mutations, deletions, insertions, inversions, translocations
